message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your initial offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer gives you more than half!
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
Alice, this is a serious offer. Time is ticking and inflation is hurting you more than me.  This deal is fair and gets us both a good chunk of money.
I'll try 57-43, but I won't go much lower. Inflation is a factor, but so is fairness.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're running out of time, and you're letting good money slip away because of stubbornness. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
